text: DWVN-DTV (channel 45) is a non-commercial digital television station of Gateway UHF Television Broadcasting. Its studios are located at San Juan cor. Donada Streets, Pasay, while its transmitter is located at GSat Technical Facilities and Earth Station Building, First Global Technopark Complex, Lot 1910 Governor's Drive, Barangay Ulong Tubig, Carmona, Cavite. As of December 1, 2018, the TV station's analog signal was permanently shutdown. ==Digital channels== UHF Channel 45 (659.143 MHz) Channel Video Aspect Short name Programming Note 45.01 1080i 16:9 Hope Phil Hope Channel Philippines Fully migrated from analog to digital/Test Broadcast/Configuration Testing 45.02 480i Hope International Hope Channel International Test broadcast 45.03 Hope Live Hope Channel Philippines 45.04 GNN SD Golden Nation Network == Areas of Coverage == === Primary areas === * Metro Manila (weak signal, soon to be expand in whole areas) * Cavite * Laguna ==== Secondary Areas ==== * Bulacan (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Rizal * Portion of Pampanga (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Nueva Ecija (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Tarlac (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Zambales (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Bataan (soon to be expanded) * Portion of Batangas * Portion of Quezon ==Related pages== * 3ABN * Hope Channel Philippines ==Other websites== * 3ABN's official website * Category:Filipino television stations
title: DWVN-DTV
